name: NSDiffableDataSourceSectionSnapshotReference
desc: The Swift representation of the Objective-C object you use to represent the state of the data in a layout section at a specific point in time.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates an empty section snapshot.

items.name: func ofParentItem(Any) -> NSDiffableDataSourceSectionSnapshotReference
items.desc: Creates a section snapshot containing the child items of the specified parent item, excluding the parent item.

items.name: func ofParentItem(Any, includingParentItem: Bool) -> NSDiffableDataSourceSectionSnapshotReference
items.desc: Creates a section snapshot containing the child items of the specified parent item, including the parent item.

items.name: func appendItems([Any])
items.desc: Adds the specified items to the section snapshot.

items.name: func appendItems([Any], intoParentItem: Any?)
items.desc: Adds the specified items as child items of the specified parent item in the section snapshot.

items.name: var items: [Any]
items.desc: The identifiers of all items in the section snapshot.

items.name: var rootItems: [Any]
items.desc: The identifiers of the items at the top level of the section snapshotâ€™s hierarchy.

items.name: var visibleItems: [Any]
items.desc: The identifiers of the currently visible items in the section snapshot.

items.name: func index(ofItem: Any) -> Int
items.desc: Finds the index of the specified item in the section snapshot.

items.name: func level(ofItem: Any) -> Int
items.desc: Finds the hierarchical level of the specified item in the section snapshot.

items.name: func parent(ofChildItem: Any) -> Any?
items.desc: Finds the parent item of the specified item in the section snapshot.

items.name: func containsItem(Any) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether the section snapshot contains the specified item.

items.name: func isVisible(Any) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether the specified item is currently visible onscreen.

items.name: func insertItems([Any], afterItem: Any)
items.desc: Inserts the provided items immediately after the item with the specified identifier in the section snapshot.

items.name: func insert(NSDiffableDataSourceSectionSnapshotReference, afterItem: Any) -> Any
items.desc: Inserts the provided section snapshot immediately after the item with the specified identifier in the section snapshot.

items.name: func insertItems([Any], beforeItem: Any)
items.desc: Inserts the provided items immediately before the item with the specified identifier in the section snapshot.

items.name: func insert(NSDiffableDataSourceSectionSnapshotReference, beforeItem: Any)
items.desc: Inserts the provided section snapshot immediately before the item with the specified identifier in the section snapshot.

items.name: func deleteItems([Any])
items.desc: Deletes the items with the specified identifiers, and any of their child items, from the section snapshot.

items.name: func deleteAllItems()
items.desc: Deletes all of the items from the section snapshot.

items.name: func replaceChildren(ofParentItem: Any, with: NSDiffableDataSourceSectionSnapshotReference)
items.desc: Replaces all child items of the specified parent item with the provided section snapshot.

items.name: func isExpanded(Any) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether the item with the specified identifier is in an expanded state.

items.name: func expandItems([Any])
items.desc: Expands the specified items in the section snapshot.

items.name: func collapseItems([Any])
items.desc: Collapses the specified items in the section snapshot.

items.name: func expandedItems() -> [Any]
items.desc: The identifiers of all expanded items in the section snapshot.

items.name: func visualDescription() -> String
items.desc: Returns a string with an ASCII representation of the section snapshot.
